contentrichtext.text: {{no footnotes|date=February 2013}} {{Infobox person | name = Gustaf Skarsgård | image = Gustaf Skarsgård 20100805 2cr.JPG | caption = Skarsgård on the Southern Isle of [[Stockholm]] in August 2010. | birth_name = Gustaf Caspar Orm Skarsgård | birth_date = {{Birth date and age|1980|11|12|df=y}} | birth_place = [[Stockholm]], [[Sweden]] | occupation = [[Actor]] | years_active = 1984–present | parents = [[Stellan Skarsgård]] | relatives = [[Alexander Skarsgård]] <small>(brother)</small><br>[[Bill Skarsgård]] <small>(brother)</small> }} '''Gustaf Caspar Orm Skarsgård''' ({{IPA-sv|ˈskɑːʂɡoːɖ}}; born 12 November 1980) is a [[Sweden|Swedish]] [[actor]]. ==Early life== Gustaf Skarsgård was born in [[Stockholm]], [[Sweden]], to Swedish actor [[Stellan Skarsgård]] and My, a physician. He has five siblings: [[Alexander Skarsgård|Alexander]], Sam, [[Bill Skarsgård|Bill]], Eija and Valter, and two half-brothers from his father's second wife Megan Everett, Ossian and Kolbjörn.<ref>{{cite web|last=Abramovitch|first=Seth|title=Stellan Skarsgard, 61, Welcomes Baby Number 8|url=http://www.hollywoodreporter.com/news/stellan-skarsgard-61-welcomes-baby-365430|publisher=Hollywood Reporter|accessdate=21 September 2012|date=24 August 2012}}</ref> Alexander, Bill, and Valter are also actors. His godfather is acclaimed Swedish actor [[Peter Stormare]]. == Filmography == {| class="wikitable sortable" |- ! Year ! Title !
